source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_SKYWATCHER_000_000<tab>Not that it isn't always wise to keep an eye on the skies, but in the Diadem it could be the difference between life and death, considering how it affects the behavior of beasts. Care to know what the fates have in store for us?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_SKYWATCHER_000_000<tab>この「ディアデム諸島」では、その時々の天気に応じて、
古代獣たちが活動範囲を変化させる……。
だから、独学で天気を読む方法を編み出したのさ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_030<tab>Some of Eureka's—rather vicious, I must say—fauna are active only in certain climatic conditions, so I do hope the adventuring contingent will take a healthy interest in my reports.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_030<tab>「エウレカ」では特定の天候時のみ、
活動が確認されている魔物もおります。
冒険に出る際には、私の予報をご活用ください！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_100_030<tab>However, if you are hoping to glean some knowledge on the phenomenon of umbral turbulence, I am afraid you will be left wanting. It is a rather fickle atmospheric condition whose mysteries yet elude us.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_100_030<tab>なお、「乱霊流」と呼ばれる天候だけは、
その発生を予測できませんので、ご注意ください。
